name: GrantRegistry
description: The Gitcoin GrantRegistry contract keeps track of all grants that have been created. It is designed to be a singleton, i.e. there is only one instance of a GrantRegistry which tracks all grants. It behaves as follows: - Anyone can create a grant by calling `createGrant` - A grant's `owner` can edit their grant using the `updateGrant` family of method - The `getAllGrants` and `getGrants` view methods are used to fetch grant data.

eventDecorators.name: GrantCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new grant is created.

eventDecorators.name: GrantUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a grant's owner is changed.

functionDecorators.name: createGrant
functionDecorators.description: Create a new grant in the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: Grant owner (has permissions to modify grant information).

parameterDecorators.name: _payee
parameterDecorators.description: Address that receives funds donated to this grant.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaPtr
parameterDecorators.description: URL pointing to grant metadata (for off-chain use).

functionDecorators.name: getAllGrants
functionDecorators.description: Returns an array of all grants and their on-chain data. May run out of gas for large values `grantCount`, depending on the node's RpcGasLimit. In these cases, `getGrants` can be used to fetch a subset of grants and aggregate the results of various calls off-chain.

functionDecorators.name: getGrantPayee
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address that will be used to pay out donations for a given grant. The payee may be set to null address.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Grant ID used to retrieve the payee address in the registry.

functionDecorators.name: getGrants
functionDecorators.description: Returns a range of grants and their on-chain data.

parameterDecorators.name: _startId
parameterDecorators.description: Grant ID of first grant to return, inclusive, i.e. this grant ID is included in return data.

parameterDecorators.name: _endId
parameterDecorators.description: Grant ID of last grant to return, exclusive, i.e. this grant ID is NOT included in return data.

functionDecorators.name: grantCount
functionDecorators.description: Number of grants stored in this registry.

functionDecorators.name: grants
functionDecorators.description: Mapping from Grant ID to grant data.

functionDecorators.name: updateGrant
functionDecorators.description: Update multiple fields of a grant at once. To leave a field unchanged, you must pass in the same value as the current value.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaPtr
parameterDecorators.description: New URL that points to grant metadata.

functionDecorators.name: updateGrantMetaPtr
functionDecorators.description: Update the metadata pointer of a grant.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaPtr
parameterDecorators.description: New URL that points to grant metadata.

functionDecorators.name: updateGrantOwner
functionDecorators.description: Update the owner of a grant.

functionDecorators.name: updateGrantPayee
functionDecorators.description: Update the payee of a grant.
